title: My Name Is Julia Ross (restored, with intro and outro) (1945, film noir, imdb score: 7)

sources.title: My Name Is Julia Ross (restored, with intro and outro) (1945, film noir, imdb score: 7)
sources.description: My Name Is Julia Ross is a 1945 American film noir thriller directed by Joseph H. Lewis , and starring Nina Foch , Dame May Whitty , and George Macready . Its plot follows a young woman in England who is hired as a live-in secretary for an ailing widow, where she awakens one day and is gaslighted by those around her, claiming she is someone else. The screenplay is based on the 1941 novel The Woman in Red by Anthony Gilbert . The film received a loose remake called Dead of Winter (1987), starring Mary Steenburgen .
